text: Alexander Sarkissian was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Max Purcell won the title after Andrew Whittington retired while trailing 3–6, 7–6(8–6), 5–1 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Gimcheon Open ATP Challenger - Singles 2016 Singles
title: 2016 Gimcheon Open ATP Challenger – Singles
